title: 服务器只要有两个人就不行！！！求教
txt_content:
我是一个腐竹，我的服务器只能一个人玩，如果两人进了服务器就会出错！！请问如何修复！！
服务器后台显示[Server] Server thread/ERROR This crash report has been saved to: ./crash-reports/crash-2014-12-14_19.10.13-server.txt
错误报告：
---- Minecraft Crash Report ----
// This doesn't make any sense!


Time: 12/14/14 7:10 PM
Description: Exception in server tick loop


java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: -1
        at java.util.ArrayList.elementData(ArrayList.java:400)
        at java.util.ArrayList.get(ArrayList.java:413)
        at net.minecraft.server.management.ServerConfigurationManager.func_72374_b(ServerConfigurationManager.java:1280)
        at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.func_71190_q(MinecraftServer.java:971)
        at net.minecraft.server.dedicated.DedicatedServer.func_71190_q(DedicatedServer.java:419)
        at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.func_71217_p(MinecraftServer.java:797)
        at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.run(MinecraftServer.java:661)
        at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:745)




A detailed walkthrough of the error, its code path and all known details is as follows:
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Details:

        Operating System: Linux (amd64) version 2.6.32-358.el6.x86_64
        Java Version: 1.7.0_71, Oracle Corporation

        Memory: 210890080 bytes (201 MB) / 1493696512 bytes (1424 MB) up to 3728211968 bytes (3555 MB)
        JVM Flags: 2 total; -Xmx4000M -Xms500M

        IntCache: cache: 0, tcache: 0, allocated: 13, tallocated: 95
        FML: MCP v9.01-pre FML v7.2.116.36 Minecraft Forge 10.12.0.1033 8 mods loaded, 8 mods active
        mcp{8.09} [Minecraft Coder Pack] (minecraft.jar) Unloaded->Constructed->Pre-initialized->Initialized->Post-initialized->Available->Available->Available->Available
        FML{7.2.116.36} [Forge Mod Loader] (mcpc-plus-1.7.2-R0.4-forge1033-B50.jar) Unloaded->Constructed->Pre-initialized->Initialized->Post-initialized->Available->Available->Available->Available

求下载地址！
http://sourceforge.net/projects/cauldron-unofficial/files/1.7.10/  你点文件 可以找到1.6.2到1.7.10

replies.author: liwei224
